title: Can you read books on the Kindle without WiFi? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on the specific model of Kindle that you have. You need either a 3g or a wi-fi connection to download the books (but not to read them once they are downloaded). Some models of Kindle include both cellular and wi-fi connectivity. The cheaper ones include only wi-fi, so if you have one of those, you will indeed need wi-fi to get your books.
WiFi is required for downloading books to your Kindle. Not required for reading as the books are already on your device.
